attributes.action: stop following everything the European Union says and start running our country our self.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To stop following the E.U. in  all of there decission making and let Britian stand on its own again. We need to stop bowing to everything they tell us to do and say NO, or ignore it like the rest of Europe! 
Then may be we can make Britian great again.
